Package gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc

Class EventReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc.EventReporter
  • public class EventReporter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a mechanism for reporting exceptional events. Reporting an event with this class is intended to get more attention than merely logging it. Currently, events are reported to email recipients while limiting the rate.
    Author:
    B. Harris

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  EventReporter.SuppressedNotifier
      This class implements a Runnable to report that some notifications were suppressed.

      • getNotificationsEnabled

        public boolean getNotificationsEnabled()
        Indicates whether notifications are enabled.
        Returns:
        true if notifications are enabled. Otherwise false.

      • setNotificationsEnabled

        public void setNotificationsEnabled​(boolean newValue)
        Set whether notifications are enabled.
        Parameters:
        newValue - new value indicating whether notifications are to be enabled.

      • suppressNotifications

        private boolean suppressNotifications()
        Determines whether nofications should be suppressed.
        Returns:
        true if notifications should be suppressed because they are disabled or due to the rate limit. Otherwise, false.

      • report

        public void report​(java.lang.String clientId,
                   java.lang.String serviceId,
                   java.lang.String msg,
                   java.lang.Exception ex)
        Sends an email message to report the occurance of an event. Reporting an event with this method is intended to get more attention than merely logging it.
        Parameters:
        clientId - identifies the client that prompted this report.
        serviceId - identifies the service generating this report.
        msg - the text describing the event that is to be included in the email message
        ex - an exception associated with the event being reported. if this parameter is not null, the exception's stack trace is included as an attachment to the email.

      • report

        public void report​(java.lang.String clientId,
                   java.lang.String serviceId,
                   java.lang.String msg,
                   java.lang.Exception ex,
                   java.lang.String request)
        Sends an email message to report the occurance of an event. Reporting an event with this method is intended to get more attention than merely logging it.
        Parameters:
        clientId - identifies the client that prompted this report.
        serviceId - identifies the service generating this report.
        msg - the text describing the event that is to be included in the email message
        ex - an exception associated with the event being reported. if this parameter is not null, the exception's stack trace is included as an attachment to the email.
        request - string representation of request associated with this event.

      • report

        private void report​(java.lang.String clientId,
                    java.lang.String serviceId,
                    java.lang.String msg,
                    jakarta.activation.DataHandler[] attachments)
        Sends an email message to report the occurance of an event. Reporting an event with this method is intended to get more attention than merely logging it.
        Parameters:
        clientId - identifies the client that caused this report.
        serviceId - identifies the service generating this report.
        msg - the text describing the event that is to be included in the email message
        attachments - DataHandlers for the attachments that are to be included as attachments to the email.
